name: INBalanceTypeResolutionResult
desc: A resolution result for balance types.

items.name: class func success(with: INBalanceType) -> Self
items.desc: Creates an object whose resolution involves the successful matching of the specified attribute.

items.name: class func confirmationRequired(with: INBalanceType) -> Self
items.desc: Creates an object whose resolution requires that the user must confirm the value before proceeding.
